website_summaries.verdict: Choose this portable TV if you want a slightly larger screen with better image quality than most models in its size range. However, keep in mind that it doesn't have a built-in battery.
pros: Has a 15.6-inch screen that offers portability yet is larger than others
Includes a stand and remote control
cons: A plug-and-play model, which means you'll need a power outlet

customer_reviews.title: Suits me perfectly...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this LED TV five stars because I understand what it is and your viewing angle can be somewhat compromised if viewing from the side or overhead. Your viewing angle needs to be looking pretty close to straight at it. But that is okay with me. What I did to ensure this was not a problem I ordered a tilt wall mounting stand ($10.00.) This way it is easy to adjust screen for perfect viewing. Also, I am really surprised more people haven't bought this TV if you're looking for something around 16 inches you can't beat the price. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure_Some

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I’been looking for a replacement for a while and this is just right, compared with another brand you can’t go wrong with the price and quality, I use it for my CCTV and the quality of the image is really good, The sound quality is a little bad but I really don’t mind. Is compact and light weight. I also purchased the wall base that it is recommended for the monitor and it worked perfect for the location of my system.
customer_reviews.author: hernan

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture. Not difficult to set up. Fits nicely on my counter in kitchen under cabinets. Terrible speakers that sound like an old pocket size transistor radio. Because there is an earphone jack, I will be able to add a small external speaker. Firestick works well on HDMI input jack. Found a code for my Dish Tv remote (526) via scan method where vol, mute, on off all work. Tried to get the source button programmed to the DISH remote, but it just wouln’t recognize it. I can live with that. The other “con” besides the speakers is the “fried electronics” smell. Hopefully, the circuit board is okay. Other than those small issues, I like the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Love

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and picture, but no tv code for setting cable/universal remotes
customer_reviews.text: The tv is a nice size for our kitchen, but PYLE does NOT have a tv code. This means that you can NOT set your universal or cable remote to control this tv. That’s a big downer for us. Yes... I did write the company and they confirmed this fact.
customer_reviews.author: Geenza

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great picture but sound volume is low even when turned up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small 1080P monitor for my AV-Receiver for viewing system setup and DVD-Audio information. For this system I did not need a full-fledged large TV monitor because I use this system for audio listening. I found this 15.5" Pyle on Amazon and it serves my purposes. One complaint would be the location of the HDMI plug input is in a very awkward location behind the TV stand which makes it difficult to plug-in and requires a bit of a bend on the cable. A more flexible HDMI cable will solve that (or a 90-degree adapter). I just did not have one handy. .
customer_reviews.author: KB from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Only OK looking head on and with hdmi .
customer_reviews.text: Horrible viewing angles. Bad light bleed and poorly located HDMI and Ant. IN(RG6) ports make many hdmi cables useless due to the limited distance between the ports and the stand base. Needs L connector for 3rd party external or amplified indoor HD antennas. Included Antenna only picks up 2 of my local stations and i live 3 miles from every major stations repeater on Signal Hill in downtown Long Beach Purchased indoor amplified antenna and still same stations. Speakers are HORRIBLE 1990's taped answering machine quality
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this for tv use...especially for the kitchen. The tv does not tilt so your viewing angle does not allow you to get any picture quality. In addition, the sound quality is poor and consistent with other reviews suggesting the sound is “tinny”. Lastly, the product was missing 1 of 4 rubber feet on the stand and the user manual is poorly written. Other than the above - it’s a great tv! Sending it back tomorrow...
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Pyle 15.6 inch led tv
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a monitor for video output with my Avid Media Composer editing system. my space requirements limited me to a 16 inch size. The picture quality is very good to excellent, but it degrades if looked at from the side, or top. The sound is very tinny. I had to purchase a set of USB speakers to plug into the audio out ports to get decent sound. Otherwise, I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to pack a TV...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how the picture quality is yet, but the “Energy Guide” sticker was placed directly on the screen and of course left adhesive residue, on which I cannot use adhesive remover because it would damage the screen...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Adkerson

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions for better results
customer_reviews.text: The surround sound is too low in volume so use the normal sound choice. Pyle claims you have to use their remote but they are wrong. Direct TV AT&T remote works as the tech from AT&T programmed it. It can be done. You have to watch the TV right in front of it or the picture quality is bad. I tried a soundbar with RCA connection and it did not work. I think it works only with the HDMI type plug but the TV only had one of these outlets and it was already in use. Great TV for the price. Overall a reasonable price for the TV and very good picture on a satellite connection.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Spurs

customer_reviews.title: Great small TV
customer_reviews.text: I'm replacing a 15 inch TV that went out on me a few days ago. I went to Amazon.com to see what was available and this TV got really good comments, so I thought I'd give it a try. Glad I did. It's a great picture and for some reason, I'm getting more than double the area TV stations using the same equipment as the other TV had. Very pleased with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: mdgoose

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, good picture, terrible everything else.
customer_reviews.text: The Bad: Nearly everything It is hard to describe how simply awful the sound is from this device. Built-in settings (music, movie, etc) were almost indistinguishable from one another. The output volume barely changes through its range and should be relabeled less horrible->horrible. Actually I believe it would be difficult to design a sound system this bad. And because the whole design centered around size the thought of adding auxiliary speakers to compensate is silly. The setup experience is among the worst I've ever encountered. Terminology is not defined. There are controls the remote that don't appear to do anything. The Good: Cheap and acceptable picture quality You get what you pay for. Basically it's junk.
customer_reviews.author: QBit47

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little TV, well worth the money paid for it
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem in the camper if both sitting at the table and also watching tv, because hubby does not have eyes in the back of his head, and could not see the tv without constantly turning around. This is the perfect solution for us, as now it fits easily behind my bench and he now has it in direct line of sight. The picture quality is excellent, the sound is meh, but acceptable. Well worth the money we paid, and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Milner

customer_reviews.title: Perfetc Fit - Great quality for its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to mount on back wall under kitchen cabinets! Picture quality is really good and while the sound isn't like a BOSE, the sound is good for the screen size and serves the purpose. I was able to program my DirecTV remote easily despite other feedback, it seems to be the second code according to DTV but not sure what that code is since it scanned and paired automatically for me. So far so good. I scored points with the wife too! She can cook and bake while watching Live PD! ha ha!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good tv for size and price point.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. Unlike other reviewers I have found the picture quality from an angle (about 45 degrees) to be very good. Overall, it delivers very good picture quality. Like other reviewers I agree the sound is rather tinny. Adjustments have made minimal improvement. I think it is partly due to the location of the speakers bouncing off a kitchen wall, which is where I have placed the tv. The best I came up with was to set base at full intensity and treble at least intensity. Not great but certainly tolerable for this size tv at this price point
customer_reviews.author: William Schiessl

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture, terrible sound, but worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Realize going into it that the sound quality is absolutely terrible. I knew this and purchased an inexpensive sound bar (as recommended by other reviewers). Works great. It has inputs for just about every source known to man. I have it over my desk so the viewing angle is perfect. I purchased a small wall mount that would tilt down about 15 degrees. Aside from the sound, the only issue is that it doesn't remember that it was muted after it is powered off so it comes back on un-muted. The old TV I had would remember. But this is a nit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Herman

customer_reviews.title: good for CCTV system
customer_reviews.text: we installed this in a kitchen where customers wants to watch the video cameras from the corners of the outside house and they love it, small video is good
customer_reviews.author: francisco

customer_reviews.title: Can work on main cable tv in rv
customer_reviews.text: Got it for our RV; came with coaxial with an aerial connection. Went to hardware store $ got a rt Angle coaxial connector. Plugged into RV & works. Sound not very loud at 100%. It fit in Alpha RV bedroom site. Had to duck tape it inside shroud to place it little TV’s hard to get now
customer_reviews.author: maryelen

customer_reviews.title: the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: love the size of my Pyle tv fits under my kitchen cabinets just perfect . I have my TV turn on an angle. So far I am using a wing antenna for use in kitchen only. I love when I come in the kitchen and the tv is just looking at me. After all I got a gift card from my nephew to use at amazon. What a beautiful gift I decide to get a needed purchase with it. Thanks amazon for the deliver so fast great product.
customer_reviews.author: browneyes

customer_reviews.title: Sharp pciture, fussy to connect
customer_reviews.text: Fine as a laptop-size monitor, replacing a 17-inch monitor-TV that finally stopped working. TV picture is sharp and tuner, connected to exterior antenna, is better than the Viewsonic it replaced. Cons: base is non-tilting; when the base is installed, the clearance to push in certain connectors is minimal because of the two speaker bumpouts on the rear, so getting them in place is challenging. So 4 stars out of 5 since I can't give it 4-1/2. The price is good and the TV is well-packed and arrived in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Odonnell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is just fine, but the sound is absolutely horrible. It reminds me of watching an old drive-in theater movie with the speaker that you sit in your car. I wish I never bought the TV. I saw reviews before I bought it where some people said that the sound was not good, but I figured it couldn’t be that bad.... I was wrong. It’s horrible! I’m trying to find a speaker that I can hook up to it to at least be able the hear it better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: worked fine for two weeks, sound was tinny but fine for the kitchen. After two weeks will not turn on, Power is getting to the tv because red light is on. Every now and then the green "on" light turns on then off quickly. Picture never appears. Called Pyle and they said to return.
customer_reviews.author: jbs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly surprised . This tv is an excellent buy for the money. The picture is great, the sound could be better but for the price can't beat it. The tv was really simple to put together, it's not rocket science. The only thing that I did not like is the remote. It should be smaller. I was only able to get two channels because I don't have cable. I hooked a Roku up to the tv and I am very happy. I also like the fact that it has other jacks available to attach extras. All in All I thought it was an excellent purchase for the money and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is good at straight on viewing
customer_reviews.text: Product did not have the capability to accept a remote from a cable provider or any other remote. Not disclosed in product description. Sound is tinny and does not improve with treble nearly off and bass at max. Picture quality is good at straight on viewing. Customer service did know what bolt size was needed to mount on a bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Long

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture.  Sound is tinny. Bring your own HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.text: This tv is perfect for placing on a kitchen counter underneath the wall cabinets. It is about 11 inches tall(with stand), and leaves 4 inches to spare under my cabinets. The sound is tinny, which is to be expected, given such a small, thin, tv. The stand does not allow any tilting, so I put a little shim under the 2 front feet to improve the resolution( if you sit on a bar stool). It does not come with an HDMI cable, so you need to supply that yourself if you get a HIDEF signal from your provider. Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good TV, Poor sound and Mount
customer_reviews.text: This is a good TV with good picture quality once we got it mounted at the proper viewing angle from the kitchen counter. We had to prop it up on the small satellite box because the mounting stand is at a fixed angle. It would be beneficial and enhance the picture quality if the mounting stand had tilt and swivel action. And of course the sound quality is poor, but we understood that before the purchase thanks to previous reviews. I suppose external speakers will help, but we need to find a pair that will fit into the small space where we have mounted our small TV.
customer_reviews.author: casasbv

customer_reviews.title: Viewing angle is disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a kitchen, we have it adjusted to an angle where we usually sit. If you're someplace else working in the kitchen the screen is just black to you. We have a pretty small kitchen. It's a really tight viewing angle. Not 170 degrees or whatever they claim, more like 70 degrees or so. It's a pretty good picture when you're straight on.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel Scott

customer_reviews.title: PYLEUSA 15" LED TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV was purchased for the kitchen to replace a Philips television that was 15 years old. After unpacking, following the installation instructions, and powering it up, the Pyle ran a channel scan for our satellite channels and within two minutes the picture was on the screen. The color is good, the sound a bit tinny as has been described by other reviewers. That should be an easy fix if we decide to upgrade with some external powered speakers. It fit the space easily, as the Philips it replaced, was the old tube type. Now the real test begins to see if this one can have a good long life also.
customer_reviews.author: ChadL

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality speakers
customer_reviews.text: Got this today for my kitchen. Tried to hook it to cable and because of the connection on the back, you need to have a 90 degree coax cable connection. After obtaining the cable connector, the set up was easy. Very disappointed with the sound quality. I will be buying a small external speaker so I can hear it. Even with the volume turned up very high, the sound is terrible. For the price, it is an okay tv.
customer_reviews.author: Joan T.

customer_reviews.title: A good small TV for my home office
customer_reviews.text: This tv works very well (I did get an external speaker so I don't know about the internal speaker). I also have to point the tv screen towards me. The picture quality from the side is not so good. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DG

customer_reviews.title: Great TV but terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small TV for the kitchen. This TV is great but the sound is awful. However, I bought this soundbar (NJSJ Computer Sound Bar Speaker,USB Powered Wired Stereo Speakers with 3.5mm Aux Input ,Mini Soundbar for PC /Tablets/ Desktop / Laptop/Cellphones- Black) and now I am very happy. The nice thing about the soundbar is that it is USB powered and can be plugged into the back of the TV USB port. If you are not prepared to buy a soundbar or some external speaker, don't buy this TV
customer_reviews.author: Graeme

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: The picture is good. The sound is horrible. I purchased small computer speakers but I didn’t realize I need to plug in right and left, speakers have shared cord. May return but one speaker much better than tv sound. For the money, I am going to keep TV but work on sound. I was unable to select stars for value for money, would give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pat S.

customer_reviews.title: screen goes white, no picture
customer_reviews.text: as soon as we received the tv, we notice how bad the sound was but hooked up speakers so we could watch it. 6 weeks later the screen turned white. You could hear it but no picture, we turned it off and tried it later and it came back on. A few weeks later it did it again and now is starting to happen more often. 30 day return policy for this tv was not enough time. What a waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A Roosa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Received TV today; easily set up; as previous reviews warned, sound was NOT good-very "tinny." I used some speakers I had for a computer...perfect! Picture is clear and crisp. Only issue now is finding a Directv code so I don't have to use two remotes!-Edit: I found the codes by going into the Settings/remote menu~
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is a small tv and there is only so much we can expect for internal sound quality. I did expect a little for from Pyle as their business is making audio speakers. You will need to buy an external speaker and turn the sound off of the tv and the audio will be much improved. Good value, but buy an external speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: initial basic assembly is difficult  for a 74 yr.old man!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Getting the three S M A L L screws to attach the base took me half an hour...I felt like throwing all of it out the window...but I live on the 33rd floor( I am not kidding!!!) THEN attaching my existing HDMI cord( From m,y cordless HDMIfrom the cable box in the other room took another 15 minutes.....but the picture is great...1080 P on a 15 inch screen better be great. THE SOUND S U C K S!!!!!!!~ I would not buy this product again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mullti-use, perfect size for corner of a desk
customer_reviews.text: Great product! In VGA mode, I'm using it as a monitor for security cameras, and I use it as a TV when not viewing cameras. It also has inputs for component A/V and for an external antenna. Even the sound is pretty decent. Very good product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Smithagen

customer_reviews.title: Nicce little TV - pretty good picture for price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small low price TV with HDMI to put in my large garage, mostly as a monitor for a good music system. Maybe watch some auto related videos. Didn't expect to use it as a TV with no cable or internet there. But, it found 25 over the air tv stations, most with high def. Didn't expect that.
customer_reviews.author: CaptRon400

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking to replace an old one piece Audiovox under-cabinet TV with a similar style TV. There appear to be few choices and the reviews were not very good so based on reviews I purchased this TV and and a separate under-cabinet mount from Amazon. Just installed it and it is working fine. Very good picture quality and my wife is pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We bought the TV and stand in November. I remember seeing the warranty information. After installing the TV the sound was very tinny, which my husband couldn't hear it good. It was not compatible with our internet company, so I had to use 2 remotes. We bought it in November. Last night it died! We tried to see if it was the TV itself or the adapter, but after experimenting with different adapters we decided it was the TV. The warranty ran out in February. So we are now on the search for another TV. I don't think I will try a Pyle again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Frenger

customer_reviews.title: Sound was ridiculous!! Bad!
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this tv was ridiculously terrible. With today’s technology there is no reason why a decent speaker could not be put into a tv. We had to have our ears literally within 2 feet of the tv to hear it. This tv should be taken off the market!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Uhlir

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, bad sound.
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture quality. Must use a right angle antenna connector because they put the TERRIBLE speaker next to the connector. The antenna that comes with it is for very close stations only. The S P E A K E R S ARE T E R R I B L E........They are like the ones that came on am radios in the 1960 s ...Tinny.......make sure that you plan adding EXTERNAL SPEAKERS.....that's a must.
customer_reviews.author: Alafarmer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, terrible sound.
customer_reviews.text: This was the right size for my kitchen shelf. Picture is great, but the sound is laughably bad. Almost painful. And I’m not some snooty audiophile. Easily solved with a decent pair of computer speakers, but believe me, if you buy this you will want to spend that additional amount.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Ok small TV with some issues
customer_reviews.text: The picture is pretty good, the volume pretty pretty loud and the controls pretty easy to navigate. It does have one major flaw though in that you can't tilt the screen. So, if you're not at eye level you get the dark tinting effect. I placed a small piece of wood below the front of the base to tilt it up but that's a pretty janky solution.
customer_reviews.author: VETMANSHU

customer_reviews.title: Be aware before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I just got this TV and hope the problems I have had aren’t a sign of things to come. 1 - Energy star sticker is stuck to the screen. I removed the residue with Goo Gone but why did they do that? 2 - Remote batteries that come with the TV we re dead. 3 - I can’t pair the remote with my universal remote. 4 - I tried to contact support by going to their webpage and the webpage comes up with an error. If I can get resolution I may give the TV a better rating once after using for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Randy L.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is unbelievably tinny - like a 1950s small transistor radio. Worst sound I've ever heard from TV. Picture is average. Just got it today - too much trouble to return it but definitely not recommended for sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael I.

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Picture color tone is fair. Sound is awful! Sounds like speakers are extremely small--produces a 'tinny' sound that makes articulation difficult to understand. Volume is poor. The stand tilts the whole TV forward and at a downward angle. Have to prop it up to view it properly.. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Chard

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works perfectly in my limited space.
customer_reviews.text: GreatTV for it's size! I needed a replacement for the TV in my kitchen, which was in a cabinet above the refrigerator. Due to the small cabinet size, I was limited on what size tv I could get for a replacement. This did the trick and the picture is better than the coputer monitor it was replacing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kinkopf

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Coaxial cable was very difficult to use unless their cable/antenna was used. Speakers are in the back and point to the rear. Most people view and listen to their TV from the front ,thus rear pointing speakers are not very useful. The TV mount is not adjustable in any direction. What you see is what you get. Picture quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: bc

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Just opened this item (I bought it for my summer home which is why I’m just opening it now 8 months later) and there was No plug for the tv included. There is no way for me to turn on the TV. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gaelyn

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable speaker sound.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is unacceptable. It sounds tinny and distorted. Known actors voices sound strange. The rest of the TV with inputs and outputs is one of the only small 15.5 inch TVs or monitors on the market with flexibility. I didn’t test it with earphones or a sound bar to see if the problem is with the speakers or the sound output signal. A self powered soundbar might solve the problem, but I don’t have one laying around.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne R Schober

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying my new PTVLED15, installed 2 days ago, easy to install and easy to figure everything out. Good picture, and feel this is a good deal for the price. I purchased this for bedroom, its right by the bed so the picture size is adequate. Sound is a little tinny but not too surprised about that. I did turn up the bass and turn down treble, that helps somewhat. There is the option to install external speakers. Look forward to using it for many years to come!~
customer_reviews.author: Larry C.

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: the hole tv is only 15 inches we could of bought a bigger tv the coaxial need to be left angle the pics don't show the size of the speaker on the back side
customer_reviews.author: richard rohrman

customer_reviews.title: Tinny sound
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an inexpensive HD TV for the kitchen b/c we cut the cord and went to Hulu TV. Old TV didn't have HDMI port. Easy set up and nice, clear picture but the sound is just too tinny and very difficult for me personally to use. Should have heeded comments...
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Bakies

customer_reviews.title: very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: picture was very fussy though it got clearer with time; sound was tinny; it would not connect to the major TV channel in our area, though it connected with the others through the antenna. stand was not easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Quercus

customer_reviews.title: Lots of inputs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to interface with a security system. Turned out to be more useful than I thought. Tied into the UPS system with the antenna hooked up, it is a great emergency weather monitor when all of the power goes out.
customer_reviews.author: getoutthere

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE customer service
customer_reviews.text: I can't get the automated sound off. I tried the instructions, I tried messaging, I tried calling twice, waiting 16 minutes each time and getting disconnected. I guess its good that I can use the set, but extremely frustrating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: No video on screen. audio could be heard, but no combination of buttons would make any image appear on screen.
customer_reviews.author: Goozleberry

customer_reviews.title: No Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The picture was very good but the left speaker didn’t work so the volume wasn’t working until I found the left speaker wasn’t working
customer_reviews.author: FMIndy

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought his TV to replace an older small TV in my husband's office that suddenly died. Was delivered same day via Amazon Prime. Pretty easy to set up. Should be exactly for we wanted for the limited space available. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen TV
customer_reviews.text: Using for Kitchen TV viewing. Perfect size and great picture when viewing directly into the screen. Picture darkens when viewing at an off angle. Easy hook-up to my cable box with HDMI cable supplied with set. I'd recommend this one for use in a smaller room..
customer_reviews.author: Gennaro Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Great picture! Reception is very good. However, sound is poor. I needed to hook up external speakers. The "Owners Manual" is not much help. It needs to be easier to follow. It seems to assume a very technically astute customer and not an average senior citizen.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Swatosh

customer_reviews.title: Energy-Star label stuck on face of television
customer_reviews.text: It is permanently there, as well as scratches from trying to clean it. Not sure if everyone gets this quality of label or not, but now about 15% of the screen is covered in a sticky residue.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item with out seeing or hearing it. Picture quality is nice but the viewing angle is not so hot. The sound is terrible. Varies up and down and is "hollow" and very sharp. Not nice at all. The application of a $500 sound bar fixed the sound problem, but a 48" sound bar just doesn't work on my kitchen counter. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Just the  right size
customer_reviews.text: This sits on the bar in the kitchen where we spend a lot of time. Great value! Great Price!
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Kerns

customer_reviews.title: 15 inch TV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small space. I have mine in my dressing room. Fits perfectly, picture and sound excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Foy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 15 inch Coby from Fry's electronics and it was a real bummer. I ordered this Pyle TV with some reluctance, but when I hooked it up I was pleasantly surprised to find the set up was simple and the picture was great. It's not easy to find a 15 inch quality TV and I would highly recommend this product if a small screen TV is what you are looking for..
customer_reviews.author: howe j.

customer_reviews.title: Sound could be better
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and light weight. Installed on wall in kitchen so we can keep up while cooking. The only criticism I have is the sound quality, but in all fairness it is a small unit. Will play around with the settings and see if I can improve it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kotcher

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality was awful. It has adjustments and different settings for the sounds but any changes you make doesnt change anything.
customer_reviews.author: Carolhrtmn

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Great little tv for my kitchen. Perfect size and beautiful picture. I added old computer speakers and the sound is great. I would recommend adding something similar as the sound quality isn’t top notch but overall, I am highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small size is great for kitchen uses
customer_reviews.text: Great little TV for small locations. Remote is not good; won't allow me to change channels when I just enter numbers. I wish that would work. I've tried 2 Pyle remotes and neither allow that. I've asked Amazon customers for help and received suggestions but still doesn't work. I have made a favorites list to workaround this problem but I really wish this would work better.
customer_reviews.author: skc7

customer_reviews.title: Quality picture
customer_reviews.text: Using this as an under counter TV in the kitchen. The picture quality is very, very good and can easily be seen from anywhere in a large (16x24) room. The sound quality is OK and what you would expect from a small TV. This is a replacement for an old Audiovox 7in under counter unit that called it quits after 18yrs. The difference between the two is night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: No sound or follow up
customer_reviews.text: Power cord was bad had an extra laying around so got past this issue. Then no sound I called the number on a holiday they said they would call me back but never did. Good picture but the rest is useless
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Goschq

customer_reviews.title: Nice small tv
customer_reviews.text: Nice small tv that's fits my needs. The sound quality needs alittle upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: c maz

customer_reviews.title: very inferior product
customer_reviews.text: The picture was good, but the sound out of this TV is horrible. Very tinny, and can't be heard ten feet away. I am stunned it has been well reviewed - I will return this and look for a better quality TV.
customer_reviews.author: Karen & David E

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, poor sound
customer_reviews.text: Used this in the kitchen. Sound quality is poor but picture is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandipye

customer_reviews.title: Sound was terrible
customer_reviews.text: Picture so so...sound quality absolutely terrible...had to have on highest setting...tinny...harsh...
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Lauchert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my kitchen and very pleased. It fits in the corner, has a great picture and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ross SJC

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Pyle TVs before, but this model is junk
customer_reviews.text: Received the first unit, it worked for 5 minutes and died. Got a replacement, the audio board is terrible. Continual audio drop outs. Granted, it is a cheap TV. But still, it's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money not many options at this size
customer_reviews.text: Good picture very bad sound but hocked it to external speakers problem solved
customer_reviews.author: Tap Gnorts

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Would not power up the second day. Picture was average especially at an angle, sound was less than average. I returned it immediately for Amazon credit.
customer_reviews.author: Utah Mac

customer_reviews.title: Pyle widescreen 15.6 inch TV / my opinion
customer_reviews.text: The Pyle widescreen TV is great 👍 / it comes with a remote control a stand for the TV & power adapter a antenna & takes a couple of channels /but the channels are not doing 1080p with the antenna & some channels change definitions so i can’t choose the definition i want using the antenna 😩 / but besides that it’s still a great mini widescreen TV for price 👀
customer_reviews.author: Jason J Garcia

customer_reviews.title: it stopped working after two days.
customer_reviews.text: Junk.. absolute junk. It stopped working after two days. Picture quality sucks
customer_reviews.author: Romel G

customer_reviews.title: Cable connector won't fit
customer_reviews.text: Cable connector doesn't fit in slot of TV because the location of the slot is blocked by a plastic piece that is part of the TV. Also changing channels doesn't work well. The sound is horrible too.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Naudin

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv
customer_reviews.text: I never plugged it in! It was too large for my kitchen space.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great little tv.
customer_reviews.text: I put in kitchen. It's a great little tv for a place like that.
customer_reviews.author: J Harry McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is not sufficient from this little TV. I installed it in the kitchen and the speakers face the back and are undersized. I attached some old computer speakers to make the sound tolerable. Additionally, any angle absent straight on, does not have a quality picture. I expected much more based on the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: G. Camous

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: you cannot see the picture unless you are directly in front of the TV. If you move to the side you cannot see it. Very poor field of view. Sound quality is also very poor. I would not recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Not  a great TV - sound
customer_reviews.text: The size is great, but the speakers are in the back so it is difficult to hear as the sound projects backwards. I have not been able to find a speaker to fit that will work, as all are bluetooth. The TV is not bluetooth. If I had know the speakers were in the back, I would not have brought it.
customer_reviews.author: tammy jackson

customer_reviews.title: Sound terrible and no code
customer_reviews.text: The sound is terrible so I bought a small Bose speaker and it made a tremendous difference. Direct TV was able to provide a new remote with a universal code. The picture is distorted if viewed from the side or far away. However, for the cost, it is just what I need for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Emma's review of cornish pasties.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the profuct because the white balance &/or the contrast could not be adjusted properly. Picture always had a glare with hot spots.
customer_reviews.author: Goat Herd

customer_reviews.title: Great little TV for guest room.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a guest room. Very pleased with it. The only problem is, that because it is small, I had a little trouble connecting the cable, but once it was done, it worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: good picture
customer_reviews.text: the picture was not clear sound was good, the shape in picture was not clear shapes were not clear
customer_reviews.author: meena

customer_reviews.title: Very tinney sound
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is bad but the sound is unbearable. I waited to long to install it and missed my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: TV was the size needed and had great in/out connections.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality not very good. Since it had an earphone jack was able to use computer speakers I had which were currently not being used. Solved the sound issue and TV is great. Does exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: JLSimon

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is being used for the our camper. Fits perfect and the image is great.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur W. Mangum

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture perfect for under cabinet television.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good . Decent picture for a relatively inexpensive tv and it was relatively easy to set up once we got our cable box issues dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: bobbythehunter

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen TV
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only criticism is that the screen angle of view is narrow. But my wife loves it so it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased our TV. Set up was a little complicated for a non tech person. However, once done, it is working great. Picture is very clear and bright. I feel it is a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S.
